 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package com.mobius.vdrapi.callbacks

Interface Summary
ICanPromptForKeyValue A class implements the ICanPromptForKeyValue interface to indicate that it can, if necessary, prompt the user for a key value when parsing key value pairs.
ICanPromptForPlaybackError A class implements ICanPromptForPlaybackError to enable it to prompt the user if an error occurs while trying to playback a script.
IHasAlternateNode A class implements IHasAlternateNode to indicate that the class has an alternate representation of itself.
IHasDownloadLimit A class implements IHasDownloadLimit to enable it to provide Download Limit information, if necessary.
IHasFullLoginCredentials A class implements IHasFullLoginCredentials to indicate that it can provide login credentials, security, and ticket information, if necessary.
IHasLoginCredentials A class implements IHasLoginCredentials to indicate that it can provide login information, if necessary.
IHasTraceThreshold A class implements IHasTraceThreshold to indicate that it will provide the trace threshold level for Document Server tracing.
IHoldDownloadStatus A class implements IHoldDownloadStatus to provide the number of pages being downloaded and the total number of pages need to be downloaded.
IHoldNode A class implements IHoldNode to indicate that it can hold an INode object.
IHoldOutputRenderFormat A class implements IHoldOutputRenderFormat to indicate that it can hold a RenderFormatType object.
IHoldOutputStream A class implements IHoldOutputStream to indicate that it can hold an OutputStream object.
IHoldPage A class implements IHoldPage to indicate that it can hold an IPage object.
IHoldPageList A class implements IHoldPageList to indicate that it can hold an IPageList object.
IHoldPresentationStream A class implements IHoldPresentationStream to indicate that it can hold a ByteArrayInputStream object.
IHoldSession A class implements IHoldSession to indicate that it can hold an ISession object.
IHoldStatusMessage A class implements IHoldStatusMessage to indicate that it can provide a status message - namely, a string value describing the current state of the operation being performed.
IHoldStopFlag A class implements IHoldStopFlag to indicate that it can provide a signal as to whether or not the current operation should be stopped.
INeedFullLoginCredentials A class implements INeedFullLoginCredentials to indicate that it may need to acquire login credentials, security, and ticket information for a particular document server.
INeedLoginCredentials A class implements INeedLoginCredentials to indicate that it may need to acquire login credentials for a particular document server.
INeedObjectWithDownloadLimit A class implements INeedObjectWithDownloadLimit to indicate that it needs a callback object of type IHasDownloadLimit.
INeedObjectWithDownloadStatus A class implements INeedObjectWithDownloadStatus to indicate that it needs a callback object of type IHoldDownloadStatus.
INeedObjectWithNode A class implements INeedObjectWithNode to indicate that it needs a callback object of type IHoldNode.
INeedObjectWithOutputRenderFormat A class implements INeedObjectWithOutputRenderFormat to indicate that the class needs a callback of type IHoldOutputRenderFormat.
INeedObjectWithOutputStream A class implements INeedObjectWithOutputStream to indicate that the class needs a callback of type IHoldOutputStream.
INeedObjectWithPage A class implements INeedObjectWithPage to indicate that it needs a callback object of type IHoldPage.
INeedObjectWithPageList A class implements INeedObjectWithPageList to indicate that it will initialize and populate a list of pages.
INeedObjectWithPresentationStream A class implements INeedObjectWithPresentationStream to indicate that the class needs a callback of type IHoldPresentationStream, to handle XML-tagged output.
INeedObjectWithProfileLocation A class implements INeedObjectWithProfileLocation to indicate that it needs a callback object of type IHasProfileLocation.
INeedObjectWithSession A class implements INeedObjectWithSession to indicate that the class needs a callback object of type IHoldSession.
INeedObjectWithStatusMessage A class implements INeedObjectWithStatusMessage to indicate that it needs a callback object of type IHoldStatusMessage.
INeedObjectWithStopFlag A class implements INeedObjectWithStopFlag to indicate that it needs a callback object of type IHoldStopFlag.
INeedObjectWithTraceThreshold A class implements INeedObjectWithTraceThreshold to indicate that it can accept a callback object of type IHasTraceThreshold.
INeedOutputStream A class implements INeedOutputStream to indicate that the class needs a callback of type OutputStream.
INeedPresentationStream A class implements INeedPresentationStream to indicate that the class needs a callback of type ByteArrayInputStream.
INeedPromptForKeyValue A class implements INeedPromptForKeyValue to indicate that it may need to prompt the user for a key value.
INeedPromptForPlaybackError A class implements INeedPromptForPlaybackError to indicate that it may need to prompt the user if an error occurs during a script playback.
